name: Sexy Valentine 🍆 💜
description:
Sexy Valentine 🍆 💜 is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the romantic parts of life

The protagonist was left without plans and friends for Valentine's Day, and decided to use a dating app. After choosing several similarly lonely guys, he makes a date with them and goes in search of true love or just a good mood.

There are 5 guys you can meet in the game. You need to have dialogues with the guys and answer their questions. 2/3 or 3/3 of the correct answers give you access to 18+ content

Features:
  • Plenty of lewd scenes with various sexy boys
  • A fascinating story
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Minigames
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
